llm_analysis.narrative_start_marker: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
llm_analysis.narrative_end_marker: With the Gardiners they were always on the most intimate terms. Darcy, as well as Elizabeth, really loved them; and they were both ever sensible of the warmest gratitude towards the persons who, by bringing her into Derbyshire, had been the means of uniting them.
anomalies: Table of contents appears to mix chapter listings with front matter
Publisher information and colophon appear mixed within front matter rather than clearly separated

warnings: LLM trimmed 28918 chars of front matter
LLM trimmed 82 chars of back matter
